description: This file defines the LoginActivity class for an Android app, handling user login, input validation, session management, and navigation to the main activity.

classes.name: LoginActivity
classes.description: An Android Activity that manages user login, including session handling, input validation, and navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, checks if already logged in, and sets up button click listener for login.

methods.name: goToMain
methods.description: Starts the MainActivity and clears the activity stack.
